fields.headline: Somewhere for later
fields.bodyText: Europe France: Until March 31, two nights' B&B at the two-star Belgrand Hotel in Paris costs £99pp, including return flights from Gatwick. British Airways Holidays (0870 2424243). Italy: Visit the Venice carnival between February 16-27 with Kirker Holidays (020-7231 3333). Four-nights' B&B at the four-star Bellini hotel, which overlooks the Grand Canal, costs from £591pp (based on twin share). The price includes return flights, return water taxi transfers, and a city guide. Lithuania: Lithuanianholidays .com (0161-286 0830) is offering two weekend breaks to Vilnius. Until April, three nights in a Lithuanian home in the heart of the Old Town costs £289, and three nights in the four-star Sarunas Hotel costs £339. Prices, based on two sharing, include B&B accommodation, scheduled flights, and tickets to the opera. Africa South Africa: Couples can save £582 on a four-night stay at Ulusaba Private Game Reserve, bordering the Kruger National Park. The new price, valid until March 31, of £1,350pp includes all food, drink and activities, but not flights. From Limited Edition by Virgin (0800 716919), who can also arrange flights at a discount. Asia Goa: Departing Gatwick on April 1, 14 nights' B&B in two-star accommodation costs £419, based on two sharing, through Last Stop Holiday Shop (0800 0278232). Thailand: Quest Travel (0870 4430746) is offering a five-night break in Bangkok from £469pp (based on two sharing), valid from April 16 - June 30. Bookings must be made by January 29. Caribbean Jamaica: Lincoln (0870 8456125) is offering 14 nights' fully inclusive three-star accommodation at the Trelawny in Falmouth for £969 based on twin share. The return flight leaves Gatwick on June 18. North America Canada: Cresta Holidays (0870 1610930) is offering savings of £60 on short breaks booked before January 28 for departures until March 29. A two-night midweek stay at a three-star hotel in Toronto is now £380pp (twin share) with return flights from Heathrow. A similar break in Vancouver costs £491pp. Florida: Walt Disney World and Universal Studios are among the many attractions on offer in Orlando. A seven-night break, staying at the four-star Wyndham Hotel, Orlando, costs £475pp based on twin share and includes return British Airways flights from London. Offer valid for departures until March 22. Contact www.ebookers.com
